title: himadhri suthE
sahitya:
himAdrisutE pAhimAm
varadE paradEvatE

anupallavi
sumErumaddhya vAsini (amba)
shrI kAmAkSI

caraNam 1
hEmagAtri paNkajanEtri
mataNgAtma-
jE sarOjabhava harIsha
sura munIndranutE

caraNam 2

ambujAri nibhavadanE
mauktikamaNi-
hArahObhamAna gaLE
bhakta kalpa latE

caraNam 3

shyAmakRSNa sOdari gauri
paramEshvari giri-
jAla nIlavENi kIra-
vANi shrI lalitE
